TopicTitle: Issues with snapping parts to each other

Articles.Content:
Sometimes when i build big rockets i can seem to get part to be snapped to each other. I do place them below the current part, they are visually in nearly the correct position, but they dont snap. Is there are way to make them snap? I wish there would be a button to press so the part would snap the nearest bubbles intersecting.

Any tips?
Are you having trouble attaching them radially? This is a known bug. Turn on part clipping if you know the part is placed in a valid position.
Also, try attaching the part to something else, like under a fuel tank or rocket motor...just anywhere. After that, you can detach it and it'll go where you originally wanted to put it.
